scripts.start: npm run build && pipenv run ./manage.py runserver
scripts.docs: pipenv run sphinx-build -c docs docs docs/_build/html
scripts.build: npm run build-css && npm run build-js
scripts.watch-css: npm run build && node-sass --source-map true -o build/ --watch client/scss/dpaste.scss
scripts.watch-docs: pipenv run sphinx-autobuild -c docs docs docs/_build/html
